info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 01 at 4:55AM MST until January 01 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, with total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches with localized amounts up to 3 feet. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys, Flat Tops, Roan and Tavaputs Plateaus and Elkhead and Park Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
